ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: As of late Friday night, ALL bard quests are working properly.  at least one of every piece has been obtained on my server.  If you are on the bottom floor
ygData.messageBody:
As of late Friday night, ALL bard quests are working properly. at least one
of every piece has been obtained on my server. If you are on the bottom
floor where the bard NPCs are, go up the ramp on the lava and through the
back door, then make a right and curve around through about 3 steel double
doors and Genni is there.

Shada

> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
> Last night I acquired the fixin's for two of the bard quests (arms and
> boots), but when I got to the Temple, another bard told me
> that all the
> bard quests were broken, according to a GM, and that nobody could find
> Genni, the person who makes the lambent gems, anyway.
>
> Did people have trouble making any of the pieces of armour besides the
> previously mentioned breastplate problems?
>
> Jyzan, Karana
